  group_by(WAREHOUSE_NAME) %>%
  transmute(ave_actual=mean(ACTUAL_CREDITS),
            ave_excution= mean(EXECUTION_CREDITS),
            ave_eff = mean(EFFECTIVE_EXECUTION_CREDITS)) %>%
  distinct() %>% 
  as.data.frame()
